title: Google announces new biotech company that will study human aging
description: The tech giant aims to study the biology behind the process of aging.
contenttemplated:

Google has announced it will be starting Calico, a new biotech company that aims to study the biology behind the process of aging with the hopes of finding a way to help humans live longer.

teaser: The tech giant aims to study the biology behind the process of aging.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 19, 2013
contentencoded:
Google has announced it will be starting Calico, a new biotech company that aims to study the biology behind the process of aging with the hopes of finding a way to help humans live longer. 

Will Oremus, tech blogger at Slate, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
